something_went_wrong_please_refresh_the_: Something went wrong, Please refresh the page
name: Name
order_not_confirm_(click_on_place_order_: Order Not Confirm (click on Place order button to confirm )
go_to_profile_to_view_your_order_details: Go To Profile to view your Order details
Explore_some_of_our_customized_creations: Explore some of our customized creations to inspire your next idea.
form.instruction: Provide your name, email, WhatsApp/contact number, design description, and upload a sample picture, then submit the form.
status.pendingReviewDesc: Your design is in the pending state. Our team will review your submission shortly.
status.underReviewDesc: Our team checks your design. During this phase, your status is 'Viewed'. We will contact you via WhatsApp or phone to finalize the details.
status.inProgressDesc: Once everything is confirmed, we start crafting your custom order with precision and care.
status.qualityCheckDesc: Your product undergoes a quality check before getting packed securely for delivery.
status.outForDeliveryDesc: Your order is on its way to your doorstep. Track the delivery in real-time.
status.deliveredDesc: Your custom creation has arrived! Enjoy your personalized product!
services.customProductDesign.title: Custom Product Design
services.customProductDesign.description: From frames to t-shirts, websites to software, home decor to furniture, and much more, personalize anything with your unique design.
services.bulkOrderProcessing.title: Bulk Order Processing
services.bulkOrderProcessing.description: Accepting any large-scale orders for businesses, events, and corporate gifting.
services.prototypeCreation.title: Prototype & Sample Creations
services.prototypeCreation.description: Get a prototype before finalizing your bulk order. Ideal for testing and refinement.
services.fullSupport.title: Full End-to-End Support
services.fullSupport.description: Consultation, design, production, quality check, and fast doorstep delivery.
services.onDemandCustomization.title: On-Demand Customization
services.onDemandCustomization.descripti: Modify existing products or create entirely new ones with our expert team.
services.description: From small personalized gifts to large-scale bulk orders, we bring your creativity to life.
testimonials.title: Customer Testimonials
testimonials.description: See what our happy customers have to say about their experience!
greeting_message: We're grateful for the trust of countless customers who have chosen us for their custom creations.
greeting_message_placeholder: While we can't showcase every story here, each one inspires us to keep delivering exceptional experiences. Thank you for being a part of our journey!
